title: What are some deep and meaningful music videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mylene Farmer and her associate Laurent Boutonnat made exceptional music videos and pretty much revolutionised French pop. - They made a full length film together - Georgino as well as many shorter films, at least one of them a trilogy. This one swept Europe and was the decades biggest hit.  Mylene has all her own film, music and production companies so she has total control of her career.  Mylene wrote the story board for the anime house.  Should perhaps explain that she almost always plays two parts in the videos, as here. They are usually tragic/poignant and she generally dies in them - one of her characters anyway. Also, she lives in LA since some nut went into her offices in Paris and demanded to see her. She wasn’t there so he shot her receptionist dead.  This following one was taken down for a long time, illustrates her playing two parts in it - a lot of the scenes using a body double, Mylene’s principle dancer, Valerié

These are few music videos that I think have deep meanings…. Akdong Musician(AKMU) - Melted It shows how adults are so cold towards people and how a little kindness could help someone so much . Here's the video with English subtitles , so you could understand the lyrics.  Stephen - Crossfire Pt 1,2,3 Part 1 shows how our everyone in our society is blind to the sufferings of innocents who are caught in the Crossfire of abusive people with authority and when someone tries to wake up the society , he/she is shut down. Part 2 shows how we have adopted wrong stereotypes of people belonging to a certain community , race ,etc. Part 3 shows how everyone is not what they seem to be and how they wear a mask to hide their true self.
